title: Welcome to TanTheta
excerpt: Introduction to the TanTheta platform and our mission to build the future of technology.
content:
# Welcome to TanTheta

We are building the future of technology through rigorous engineering, deep-tech research, and rapid product incubation.

## Our Mission

To bridge the gap between theoretical research and practical application in AI, Aerospace, and Software Engineering.

## Core Pillars

1. **Syllabus & Learning**: Mastering the fundamentals of computer science and engineering.
2. **CreatorOS**: Empowering creators with data-driven roadmaps.
3. **DeepTech**: Researching and developing frontier technologies.
4. **Health & Vitality**: Optimizing human performance for maximum output.
5. **Skill Acquisition**: Structured protocols for mastering new skills rapidly.

Explore our platform to learn more.

title: Master Todos & Execution Framework
excerpt: A comprehensive guide to executing on Frontier Technology, AI/ML Strategy, and Startup Incubation.
content:

# SECTION 1: FRONTIER DEEP-TECH AI/ML OPPORTUNITIES 2025-2035
## 20 Advanced AI/ML Products for Hard-Tech Sectors

### TIER 1: HIGHEST-VALUE (START HERE) - Priority Score 0.28-0.32

#### ✅ TODO 1.1: Quantum Error Correction Decoder-as-a-Service
- [ ] **Primary Focus:** Quantum Computing
- [ ] **Problem:** NISQ decoders run in milliseconds-to-seconds; need sub-microsecond latency for scaling
- [ ] **Market Size:** $11.1B (2025) → $20B (2030)
- [ ] **Revenue Potential:** $500K-$2M per-device licensing + $100K-$500K/year partnerships
- [ ] **MVP Timeline:** 10-14 months
- [ ] **Priority Score:** 0.316 | **Monetization Probability:** High (82%)

(See full document for more details...)
